about_the_game:
In Bravest Coconut, you’re a little cat named Coco and you’re off on a big adventure. Explore the beautiful valley, befriend the locals, and solve the mysteries that await you. Be careful though - there are monsters out there too.

Features


  • Play through the cozy story while exploring the beautiful valley.
  • A full cast of quirky characters with countless nonlinear dialogue choices.
  • Solve a bunch of zany puzzles that intertwine with the story.
  • Simple and fun combat system.
  • Hand crafted pixel art
  • Full controller support
  • Catchy original soundtrack
  • Shenanigans
detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game



In Bravest Coconut, you’re a little cat named Coco and you’re off on a big adventure. Explore the beautiful valley, befriend the locals, and solve the mysteries that await you. Be careful though - there are monsters out there too.

Features


  • Play through the cozy story while exploring the beautiful valley.
  • A full cast of quirky characters with countless nonlinear dialogue choices.
  • Solve a bunch of zany puzzles that intertwine with the story.
  • Simple and fun combat system.
  • Hand crafted pixel art
  • Full controller support
  • Catchy original soundtrack
  • Shenanigans

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 or greater
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 or greater
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Bravest Coconut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You're a little cat named Coco and you're off on a big adventure. Get to know the locals, solve puzzles, fight monsters, find treasure, and explore the beautiful valley in this classic action RPG.
